data.title: Fermentation In Winemaking
data.meta_description: Wine Project - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses an industrial visit report submitted by Dhruv Agrawal to Chateau Indage, a leading Indian wine producer. It provides background on Chateau Indage's history and operations, including its production facilities, product portfolio, management structure, manufacturing process, suppliers, customers, and competitors. The objectives and key findings of the industrial visit to better understand Chateau Indage's wine production are also summarized.
